title: Agate Fossil Beds National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    The Cook Collection   4 Photos  Items displayed in the Cook Collection were gifts to James Cook and his family from Red Cloud and many Oglala Sioux friends as well as Cheyenne friends.          Museum Collection   41 Photos            The Fossil Exhibits   5 Photos  The Fossil Exhibits in the visitor center help visitor visualize the Miocene creatures that were preserved as stone.            Wildflowers   19 Photos  The wildflowers at Agate Fossil Beds National Monument vary in color, size and times that they bloom.  From late April and early May to September there is always something blooming.  Grasses add to the variety of plants and possess a beauty of their own.           Find Your Park   3 Photos  Photos of scenery and cultural and historical pieces help visitors Find Their Park.          Wildlife   14 Photos  With the Niobrara River running through mixed grass prairie, Agate Fossil Beds National Monument is home to many different animals.            The Great Outdoors   6 Photos  The scenery at Agate Fossil Beds National Monument changes from season to season and hour to hour with the weather, clouds and time of day.
